name: samasource_site_boom
description: A dev setup for the Samasource Website

scripts.asset:process: gulp cleanTemp && gulp imgOpt && gulp assetDeploy
scripts.mjml:post:
replace-in-file '<!doctype html>' '<!--
templateType: email 
isAvailableForNewContent: true
--> 
<!doctype html>' _codeDist/markup/templates_email/**/*.html --verbose
scripts.mjml:run: npm run mjml:process && npm run mjml:post
scripts.emaildevzone: concurrently --kill-others --raw "npm run mjml:watch" "npx hs watch --portal=PROD _codeDist/markup/templates_email/ markup/templates_email/"
scripts.all: concurrently --kill-others --raw "npm run emaildevzone" "npm run imgzone" "npm run devzone"

author: Douglas Welcome
